name: Laser Maze
description:
Laser Maze is a puzzle game that takes place in an abandoned space station where you solve puzzles by redirecting lasers, moving boxes, and navigating through computer terminals. Discover the mysteries and secrets of the station and find out what happened to the crew as you puzzle your way through diabolical challenges.

Laser Maze includes fifty puzzles and ten secret puzzles for those who want a challenge.

The demo includes six puzzles and two secret puzzles.
